overview.title: Overview
overview.content: Get a summary of your progress and performance on the platform at a glance.

overview.title: Solve Rate
overview.content: Check your problem-solving efficiency with the solve rate, indicating the percentage of coding challenges completed successfully.

sidebar.title: Sidebar
sidebar.content: Access quick links and navigation options from the sidebar for easy and efficient browsing.

sidebar.title: Navigation
sidebar.content: Use the navigation menu to explore different sections and features of the platform.

calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.content: Keep a streak by coding everyday on the platform.

accountCard.title: Account Card
accountCard.content: View your current level and streak number and edit your account details from the account card, including username, email, and profile settings.

badges.title: Badges
badges.content: Earn badges upon completing courses and challenges, showcasing your accomplishments and skills.

topMasteries.title: Top Masteries
topMasteries.content: Discover the coding areas you excel in the most, based on your performance and completion rates.
